name: WORLD CONFERENCE ON PSYCHOLOGY AND BEHAVIORAL SCIENCES
content: We are thrilled to announce the forthcoming Psychology and Behavioral Sciences Conference, WPBCONF2023, to be held in the beautiful city of Manchester, United Kingdom, from 12 â€“ 14 October 2023\. This highly anticipated psychology conference will bring together preeminent researchers, scholars, and practitioners from diverse corners of the globe in the fields of psychology and behavioral sciences. WPBCONF 2023 will feature a diverse program of keynote speeches and plenary sessions by leading researchers and practitioners in the field of psychology and behavioral sciences. The Behavioral Sciences conference will cover a wide range of themes and topics related to psychology and behavioral sciences. We extend a warm invitation to you to join us for this dynamic conference, where you will have the opportunity to engage with experts, share your research findings, and gain insights into the latest developments in the psychology and behavioral sciences domains. Whether you are a speaker or listener, WPBCONF 2023 offers a distinctive platform for you to network, learn, and exchange ideas with leading professionals in the fields of psychology and behavioral sciences.
